resourceDesc.description: The text describing the type and content of the resource file.

mimeType.description: The identifier of the MIME content type and sub-type describing the resource file.

size.description: The integer indicating the size of the resource file.

uri.description: The identifier of the hyperlink for the resource file.

derefUri.description: The base-64 encoded data content of the resource file.

digest.description: The code representing the digital digest (“hash”) computed from the resource file (OPTIONAL).

description: Common Alerting Protocol Version (CAP) resource object
name: cap-resource
